titles.title: To amend the National Trails System Act to provide for a study of the Cascadia Marine Trail.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests, and Public Lands.

bill.summary:
7/31/2008--Introduced.
Amends the National Trails System Act to provide for the consideration of the Cascadia Marine Trail in the state of Washington for designation as a national scenic trail.
